text: Bheki Cele (born 22 April 1952) is the South African politician. He is the current Minister of the Police as from 26 February 2018.https://m.news24.com/SouthAfrica/News/killing-a-cop-should-be-an-act-of-treason-bheki-cele-20180823 | Killing a cop should be an act of 'treason' - Bheki Cele | News24 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1952 births Category:South African politicians
title: Bheki Cele
